Description: Limestone(?) stela recessed cross(once inlaid?); seventeen lines of Greek text, commemorating a woman named Sophia who died on Easter morning.
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1930 / Qau and Badari III (p.31, pl. LV, no.4) (translation on p.34, pl.lv, no.4)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
